tool_description: Telize offers a JSON IP and GeoIP REST API allowing to get a visitor IP address and to query location information from any IP address. It outputs JSON-encoded IP geolocation data, and supports both Cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) and JSONP.
name: Telize
title: Telize

api_list.name: Legacy - GeoIP
api_list.description: Get visitor IP address location in JSON format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://telize-v1.p.rapidapi.com/geoip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "telize-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: JSON IP
api_list.description: Get IP address in JSON format. Returns the visitor IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) in a JSON object.

api_list.name: IP
api_list.description: Get IP address in plain text format. Returns the visitor IP address (IPv4 or IPv6) in plain text, useful for shell scripts or to find the external Internet routable address.
api_list.code:

url = "https://telize-v1.p.rapidapi.com/ip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "telize-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
